hero.title: Join us to change the future!
hero.subtitle: We empower youth to become dynamic, responsible "knights" who address challenges with creativity, dedication and a commitment to excellence. Prepare them to lead and inspire positive change in the world.

about.title: Noob Knights, We Bring Hopes!
about.content1: "Noob Knights" is a dynamic volunteer group that harnesses the energy and enthusiasm of youth to create a positive impact in the community. The group's common goal is to attract young volunteers to participate in various activities, from environmental clean-ups and educational workshops to supporting local charities and organizing community events. The group's mission is to empower youth to become dynamic, responsible "knights", addressing challenges with creativity and dedication. Chicken Knights achieve their goal of creating a better and more compassionate society for everyone through teamwork and a shared vision.
about.content2: Many good people do good deeds and spread positivity to the community. Many even volunteer to fight against pandemics, hunger, or social charity without needing to equip themselves with armor or ride to a specific place. They deserve the title of knight. All it takes is the quality, spirit, and high ethics to help and do good deeds. That is what is considered noble and courageous in a person. And that is the true definition of a knight.
